name: KidTaught
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: KidTaught is not your average flash briefing. This is the place where Kids teach the Adults! We'll learn anything and everything from science to math to gaming to coding and more!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
